snippet.title: Ignited Steel: Mech Tactics | PC TRAILER
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1550740/Ignited_Steel_Mecha_TBT/

Out March 9 on Steam | Coming to all platforms on Q1 / Q2 2022

PRESS KIT: https://mega.nz/folder/c3RlAKxY#qI-Zu61dbLxQ6nWI54O5Cw

Ignited Steel is a mech roguelike turn-based-tactics game. Manage a team of overheating old-tech mechs, more heat means more vulnerability and damage! Unravel the galaxy’s story as you travel from node to node, improving your mechs, acquiring new pilots, and defeat the sentient A.I. overlord!

For more information join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/mbs
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/meteorbyte_stu
Ignited Steel twitter account: https://twitter.com/IgnitedSteelTBT
Music by Nikorem: http://nikorem.ar/
